Details

File cannot be opened - this is thrown when attempting to open a file for reading and writing but the file can't be opened. This can happen for numerous reasons: sharing violations, privilege failures, lack of space on the disk or in the directory. `class `**`FileOpenException`**` :   `[`FileException`](../object/FileException.html)
